name: Plegma
tagline: reference examples for using the Plegma API to access the Yodiwo Cloud Services
body:
### Welcome to our Plegma API Pages
Welcome to the Yodiwo Platform! We are an IoT Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) provider with a unique connectivity framework, based on the first IoT Editor that uses graphs to codelessly interconnect models of Devices and existing Apps with each other.

### API walkthrough
You can find a fairly comprehensive walk-through our API and how to use it to communicate with our cloud servers [here](https://yodiwo.readme.io).

### API reference
You can also find the formal API reference in [Doxygen](/doxygen) format or in [MSDN](/msdn) format.

### Support or Contact
Found an issue or inconsistency? Have general comments you'd like to share? We'd love to hear from you so please either [raise an issue](https://github.com/yodiwo/plegma/issues) here on GitHub or send us an email at support at yodiwo dot com.
